授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, the fundamentals of portfolio management, equity and debt securities, risk and return, diversification, and important quantitative metrics in portfolio management.
授業方法:
Students drive the class. Hands-on practice (on paper/Excel spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, Power Point slides, and student presentations.
Hy-Flex (We meet in a classroom and provide this course "Face-to Face" as well as in "Zoom.")

第1回:
Class introduction
Active vs. Passive Investing
Create portfolios (pair/group work)
第2回:
Create portfolios (pair/group work)
Prepare spreadsheets for tracking and for weekly Portfolio Manager meetings
Prepare presentation topic
第3回:
Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
Risk and Return
第4回: Asset Management Business: Firms (e.g., Vanguard, Fidelity, Blackrock), Investment Vehicles (e.g., Mutual Funds, Hedge Funds, ETFs), and Trends (e.g., Active vs. Passive)
第5回:
Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
Student presentations - Famous Investors
第7回:
Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
Diversification
第9回: Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
第11回: Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
第13回:
Portfolio Manager meeting (students present portfolio results)
Student presentations - Portfolio Products and Strategies
第14回: Student presentations - Portfolio Products and Strategies
